brands.name: McDonald's
brands.details: Openly supported genocide. Distributed free meals to IDF soliders. McDonaldâ€™s has partnership with the Jewish United Fund, which, among other things, promotes visits to Kiryat Gat, built on top of a destroyed Palestinian village. McDonalds Israel supports IDF by providing free food and drinks to Israeli militants. See tweet (click translate) for reference.
